name: data-science/linfa-image-recognition
description: A Rust image recognition template using Linfa for machine learning with handwritten digit recognition
next_steps: 🧪 Train a model: cd {{project_name}} && cargo run -- train
🔍 Evaluate model performance: cargo run -- evaluate -m model.json
🖼️ Predict with an image: cargo run -- predict -m model.json -i path/to/image.png
📚 See all available commands: cargo run -- help
